title: cgo: static variables are not initialised correctly on darwin/amd64
body:
Unarchive the attached archive and run "gotest".
On my machine this prints,

	0x100002a0001
	0xffffffff00000000
	0xffffffff00000000
	0xffffffff
	0x0
	0x10054ba78
	0x10054f370
	0x0
	0x1437e
	0x6a

where it should print all zeros.

6g macos d9ff478c4ed3+ tip
Attachments: 1. tstcgo.tgz (580 bytes)
